title: The next species of human
description: While the mega-banks were toppling in early 2009, Juan Enriquez took the stage to say: The really big reboot is yet to come. But don't look for it on the stock exchange or the political ballot. It'll come from science labs, and it promises keener bodies and minds. Our kids are going to be ... different.
author: Juan Enriquez
keywords: TED, talks, biology, business, economics, robots, science, technology
